about_the_game:
WHAT IS Forever aNd Ever?

Forever aNd Ever is a horror-romance visual novel game. Your task is to choose the right options and get to the end of the game without dead ends.... If you can even make it without them.

The game uses ball-head style inspired by country humans. It is a "heavy choices matter" game with elements of repetitive play. The more you play, the more options open up. So you can get other endings the same way, and at the same time correct your mistakes, that is, if you don't let someone get dragged away by the authorities and locked up in ###### by mistake or on purpose. The life and sanity of others is in your hands.

BRIEF STORY DESCRIBTION

There's an unknown killer in the region who is only known to be a demon, but how can that even be possible when the only demon around is you...?

Besides, your neighbor's acting very strange. He's trying to talk you into letting him walk you home, and in addition is trying to get close to you. Are you gonna trust him or avoid him? What's his problem, why is he trying to get close to you?

On top of all that, your friend Christine's birthday party is coming up. Are you gonna go or are you gonna stay home? What if something happens there, will you get over your paranoia and make her happy?

CHARACTERS

Matyash Kral, an influencer who is not very good at social interactions but behind the computer he is a completely different person. He likes fashion and good food, he is very good at cooking. A lot of people around him would label him as an extrovert, but the opposite is true. He's your neighbor and also a very good friend of your best friend who is trying to set you up. He doesn't get upset about anything and plans things out in advance. He'll offer a helping hand and it's up to you to accept or decline.

Michael is your classmate from middle school which dissapeared to god knows where in highschool. He is mostly calm and loves to drink. After his break up with his girlfriend he search you up to be friends with you again. Will you welcome him back into your life and give him a second chance? Or will you choose to turn your back to him after you find the truth behind his unexplained absence?

Christine is your best friend with a very energetic personality. Whenever you don't bring food, she'll leave something small in your locker and help you with anything she can. She's quite temperamental and even though she doesn't realize it, she's often quite commanding. Christa shows her love for humans way too much and anything on the subject can get her fired up for hours and hours of conversation about how wonderful they are. She has a very sweet tooth so the way to her heart may as well be a sugar cube.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features themes that might be uncomfortable to some audience such as explicit language, adult themes, violence, bullying, threatening, sudden death, suicide, gaslighting and so on. Everything is just a work of fiction, so please do not apply anything you see in the game to the real life. 

If you feel uncomfortable please stop playing the game.

short_description: In this horror-romance visual novel game your choices shape your destiny. Choose who to trust and find the truth. Catch the killer and avoid the stalker. Can you get through the bad and dead endings? Will you find a love or kill everyone? The choice is yours! Choose who lives and who dies.
